title: Entertainment Live: Golden Globe 2016 nominations - BBC News
summary: carol leads nominations with five nods .
eddie redmanye , idris elba , mark rylance and kate winslet among film nominees .
david oyelowo , damian lewis and patrick stewart among tv nominees .

documents.title: that 's a wrap !
text: so that 's it from today 's golden globes live page special .
we hope you 've enjoyed it - and if nothing else , you 'll have learnt how to pronounce saoirse !
we 're back tomorrow at the normal live page opening time of 08:00 gmt .

documents.title: idris elba 's double celebration
text: idris elba received two nominations - best supporting actor for beasts of no nation and a best actor for bbc drama luther .
he shared his delight with the hollywood reporter :
wow , thank you to the hfpa , who have always been so amazingly supportive of me throughout my career .
i 'm so excited , in particular , to be recognized for both luther and beasts of no nation .
for luther , what better way to celebrate the end of a great run than with this stellar acknowledgement .
as for beasts , i can only hope this attention will get more people to see the brilliance of all that is cary fukunaga and my extraordinary co-star abraham attah .
i share in this exciting moment with everyone who poured their hearts into these projects and for who i could not have done this without .
author: The Hollywood Reporter

documents.title: michael fassbender 'grateful ' for nomination
text: michael fassbender has earned himself a golden globe nomination for his role as the eponymous steve jobs .
working with danny boyle and our amazing cast , has been one of the most creative and amazing experiences of my professional life .
the film also up nominations for kate winslet , aaron sorkin ( for best screenplay ) and for daniel pemberton 's score - who was suitably excited about his first golden globe nomination .
i wanted to 'think different ' in how i approached this score and working with a cinematic visionary like danny boyle meant i could .
since steve jobs was brilliantly written by aaron sorkin in three acts i took three different musical approaches , so danny got three scores for the price of one - bargain of the year !

documents.title: the revenant director inarritu planning celebratory drink
text: alejandro g inarritu has spoken to bbc news about his four golden globe nominations for the revenant .

the film , which sees leonardo dicaprio playing an explorer who is left for dead after being mauled by a bear , is shortlisted for best dramatic film , best director , best actor ( for dicaprio ) and best score .
i think it 's very good news for the film and for all the crew and actors that were involved .
it took a lot and we gave a lot .
he added he was looking forward to getting together with the team `` to have a drink and celebrate after so much work '' .
will poulter , the 2014 winner of the bafta rising star award , plays a young trapper who undergoes a dramatic rite of passage in the film .
he also shared his thoughts about awards season :
with all this awards attention , i think often people think that might be the main objective or that was something we set out to achieve .
i think for everyone the main objective was to create something very real and immersive and effective for audiences .
all the awards attention is kind of a nice bonus to that .

documents.title: the tinsel 's out and winslet 's headed to tinseltown
text: so what was kate winslet doing when she heard the news she had been nominated for best supporting actress for her role as apple marketing executive and confidante joanna hoffman in steve jobs ?
well , nothing very glamorous , as it turns out
i was trying to tidy away empty boxes that had been holding christmas decorations that i just put up .
it 's the story of my life .
a journalist said earlier : 'so how did you prepare for this day , did you get up early ? '
and i said : 'yeah , i got up early and took the kids to school . '
but i 'm so thrilled , i ca n't tell you .
maybe treat yourself to a glass of bubbly after the homework then , kate

if you want to know how to actually say it , watch her give a pronunciation lesson to james corden .

documents.title: alicia vikander 'thrilled ' by double nomination
text: alicia vikander is rapidly becoming a household name .

this year , the swedish actress earned two nominations at the golden globes - for best actress in a dramatic film , following her turn opposite eddie redmayne in the danish girl , and for her supporting role , as a robot , in ex machina .
i am truly thrilled and grateful to the hfpa for both these wonderful nominations !
to be considered amongst all these brilliant actresses and their outstanding performances is such an honour .
working on the danish girl and ex machina were such gifts in themselves , and for this to happen is all so wonderful .

documents.title: no love for depp at the globes
text: johnny depp was overlooked for a best actor nod for black mass , just a day after securing a screen actors guild nomination .
his spot in the globes shortlist was taken by will smith for concussion .

conversely , the martian made up for its lack of recognition at the sags with a controversial nomination in the comedy/musical film category - plus a nomination for sir ridley scott in the best director category .
as previously discussed , the film 's categorisation has raised many an eyebrow , as it 's hardly full of belly laughs .

documents.title: america mix-up
text: one week on from the lenny henry/ainsley harriot mix-up , whoever was tweeting on behalf of the golden globes got their latin american actresses confused .
they captioned a of presenter america ferrera with the twitter handle of gina rodriguez , who herself got a nomination for jane the virgin .

documents.title: nominations tally
text: lesbian period romance carol is leading the field at this year 's globes , up five nominations in total , including best film , best director , best original score and a double entry for best actress - for the film 's leading stars , cate blanchett and rooney mara .
the globes voting panel shared the love around the rest of the nominees , with the big short , the revenant and steve jobs all up four nominations .
those on three are - the danish girl , the hateful eight , the martian , room and spotlight .

documents.title: golden globes - here we go !
text: ok - so that 's enough industry chat .
the nominations will be announced shortly .
see them first on our live page - and stay with us for all the reaction afterwards .

documents.title: 'snubbed ' martian wins presidential thumbs up
text: the martian may have been overlooked at the screen actors guild awards - and its status as a comedy may be disputed - but the sci-fi thriller does have friends in high places .
the ridley scott blockbuster , about an astronaut stranded on mars , has been named as president obama 's favourite film of 2015 - according to people magazine .
first lady michelle obama chose the animated hit inside out - surely a dead-cert for the best animated feature film category at the soon-to-be-announced globes ?

documents.title: when is a comedy not a comedy when it 's not funny ?
text: attempts to shoehorn a film into an unexpected category has prompted some criticism .
this year , the martian has been the subject of considerable discussion after the hfpa opted to place the matt damon sci-fi hit in the best comedy or musical category .
trainwreck director judd apatow tweeted his thoughts in october .
trying to dominate the comedy category when you are really a drama afraid of dramatic competition is a punk move .
@ juddapatow almost as shitty as trying to dominate the comedy category by making trans women the butt of every joke
@ twitterid take a rocketship to the laugh-out-loud rib-tickler of the season !
tired of @ twitterid letting this happen .
movies like trainwreck and spy deserve recognition
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid remember when `` the tourist '' was nominated for best comedy in 2011 ?
@ twitterid we really need a pretentious award show for film comedy .
american comedy awards was never serious enough to matter
@ twitterid but where do you draw the line ?
not everything falls into a discrete category .
@ twitterid also , trying to game the system when you 'll be the biggest grosser in the pack makes voters think twice abt taking you seriously
@ twitterid there were no laughs in joy , it 's not a comedy and who buys a sled in texas ?
@ twitterid look it can be a comedy with a few minor audio tweaks
@ twitterid the martian is about as funny as watching putin his nose with a cruise missile
@ twitterid @ twitterid trainwreck deserves that win .
@ twitterid that is silly # trainwreck # ftw
@ twitterid also do n't fret , there 's a huge possibility that trainwreck will get a nom at the globes
@ twitterid @ twitterid wait til you hear that the martian will get a nom at the comedy category as well
@ twitterid @ twitterid punk is always alive just sporting a new haircut

documents.title: the tradition of miss golden globe
text: jamie foxx 's daughter , model and actress corinne foxx , was announced as this year 's miss golden globe last month .
it 's part of an annual tradition that sees the hollywood foreign press association give the daughter or son of a noted member of the film industry the honorary title .
`` i 've grown up watching my dad establish himself as a well-respected actor , '' said corinne , after the title was announced .
`` i 'm honored that hfpa has given me the opportunity to now share the same stage . ''
corinne will assist with the ceremony on 10 january .
freddie prinze , jr. , laura dern , melanie griffith and her daughter , dakota johnson , have all been named miss or mr golden globe previously .

documents.title: globes no guarantee of oscar succes
text: industry watchers and fans alike look to the golden globes for a steer on what could win out at the oscars .
but , as last year proved , a win at the globes does n't make for a surefire oscar win .
boyhood emerged triumphant at last year 's globes , winning best drama and best director .
but the oscars academy plumped for birdman as its best film , and gave its creator , alejandro g inarritu , the best director prize .

there was no such division in the acting categories , with eddie redmayne ( the theory of everything ) and julianne moore ( still alice ) , winning at both , and , in fact , at pretty much all 2015 award ceremonies .

documents.title: golden globes : who decides ?
text: the golden globes have long punched well above their weight when it comes to awards season .
the annual award shortlist is selected by a group of just 93 entertainment journalists and editors from around the world who make up the hollywood foreign press association .

the select group are wined and dined by hollywood bigwigs who pitch their films and tv shows in their preferred categories - but ultimately it is the hfpa who decide what is nominated and in which category .

some studios choose to pitch their films for the idiosyncratic best comedy and musical category , rather than the ty crowded best drama field - which explains why harvey weinstein has been insisting that quentin tarantino 's the hateful eight is actually a comedy

this year , the organisation upset the apple cart when they opted to include both carol 's rooney mara and the danish girl 's alicia vikander in the lead actress categories over supporting categories - leaving the best supporting actress field wide open .
most pundits agree the globes are wildly unpredictable , but they are accorded great respect in the industry - and , coming early in the season , often impact on january 's oscar nominations .

documents.title: early start for globe presenters
text: angela bassett , dennis quaid , america fererra and chloe grace moretz are the stars lined up to announce the nominations for the golden globes .
they are announced at 08:15 eastern time and 05:15 pacific time .
the early start is to allow the news to make the morning shows in the us .
one of the presenters was definitely not looking forward to that early morning alarm call .
you know you 're announcing the golden globe nominees when this is your alarm @ twitterid # nominees

documents.title: sag snubs : who missed out ?
text: the screen actors guild award threw up some surprises yesterday - with a number of notable omissions from the shortlist .

among those snubbed were awards ' darling jennifer lawrence , who has been tipped for yet another oscar nomination for joy , michael keaton for spotlight and sylvester stallone for his rocky comeback , creed .
the martian - and its star matt damon - will be hoping for better success at the globes , having been completely overlooked at the sags .
producers have gone down the slightly bizarre route of putting it forward in the comedy/musical category .
there was also no love for quentin tarantino 's hateful eight or american football drama concussion .
in the tv shortlists there was no room for ratings hits empire or fargo , which won the best drama at the globes last year .

documents.title: reaction to the screen actors guild awards
text: yesterday 's screen actors guild awards prompted a freefall of luvvie delight - and , with the golden globe nominations announced just 24 hours later - this is only the beginning
here 's what some of yesterday 's nominees told the la times .
this is a huge honor , made even more special because i 'll get to share the evening with jacob .
we 're having ice cream sundaes tonight !
everything about room was amazing , especially working with brie and becoming best buddies .
i ca n't believe it , so cool !
to be nominated by your peers and people whose work you admire is amazing .
it means a lot to say the least .
i am honestly in shock and just tickled pink that this happened .
my first thought was that i ca n't believe my mom is n't here to see this .
i wish i believed she is somewhere seeing it .
i 'm very flattered and humbled by the acknowledgment of my peers .
it really is the most special award , because it 's fellow actors .
i 've got two phones and i called my mom and dad in different ears , they seemed as surprised and happy as me .

documents.title: countdown to the globes shortlist
text: only two hours to go until this year 's golden globe nominations are announced - just 24 hours after the screen actors guild awards emphatically kicked off film awards season yesterday .
we 've been taking a look at what the industry insiders are saying , as awards momentum mounts

documents.title: come back for live coverage of this year 's nominations from 11am
text: today we will be running a special live page covering the 73rd annual golden globe awards , which are announced in hollywood at 13:00 gmt .
up on critical reaction to yesterday 's screen actors guild awards and report who the industry pundits are tipping to triumph at the golden globes .
author: Victoria Lindrea
BBC Entertainment and Arts reporter
